maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.orig: ...A Trial it is you seek, and a trial you shall receive...
maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.text: ...Испытание ты ищешь, испытание ты и получишь...

maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.orig: ...Perception is a skill few can master...
maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.text: ...Восприятие - это навык, которым немногие могут овладеть...

maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.orig: ...This trial will test your awareness and wit...
maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.text: ...Это испытание проверит твоё внимание и остроумие...

maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.orig: ...Catch the golden bug in the thicket \c[3]6 times\c[0]...
...But do so quickly, or else the trial is failed...
maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.text: ...Но сделай это быстро, иначе провалишь испытание...

maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.orig: ...Speak to me again if you wish to begin the trial...
maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.text: ...Поговори со мной снова, если хочешь начать испытание...

maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.orig: Nooooooooo...\. Don't make me chase the bug.\. Not inside the bamboo maze.\. It could hide ANYWHERE!
maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.text: Нееееееееет...\. Не заставляйте меня ловить жука.\. Не в бамбуковом лабиринте.\. Он может прятаться ГДЕ УГОДНО!

maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.orig: ...Do you wish to begin your trial...
...Take your position next to the bug...
Catch the bug in the bamboo maze \c[3]\v[tmp.MAX_ROUNDS] times\c[0]!
maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.text: Поймайте жука в бамбуковом лабиринте \c[3]шесть раз\c[0]!

maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.orig: ...This trial will test your awareness and wit...
maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.text: ...Это испытание проверит твоё внимание и остроумие...

maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.orig: ...Catch the golden bug in the thicket \c[3]\v[tmp.MAX_ROUNDS] times\c[0]...
...But do so fast, or else the trial is failed...
maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.text: ...Но сделай это быстро, иначе провалишь испытание...

maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/849/se.orig: ...Take this token as a sign of your victory...

maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/877/se.orig: ...You didn't even find the bug once...
maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/877/se.text: ...Ты даже ни разу не нашла жука...

maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/877/se.orig: ...There is still much you need to learn...

maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/891/se.orig: ...Come to me to claim your reward...
maps/forest/path-05.json/entities/891/se.text: ...Подойди ко мне, чтобы получить свою награду...
